Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.log.checkpoint

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CheckpointAppender  
    CheckPointer
    This interface represent a check pointer which is responsible to write check points in the transaction log.
    CheckPointerImpl.ForceOperation  
    CheckPointThreshold
    A check point threshold provides information if a check point is required or not.
    CheckPointThresholdPolicy
    The CheckPointThresholdPolicy specifies the overall type of threshold that should be used for deciding when to check point.
    TriggerInfo
    A TriggerInfo contains the information about the events that are triggering a check point.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCheckPointThreshold
    Abstract class that implement common logic for making the consumer to consume the description of this threshold if AbstractCheckPointThreshold.thresholdReached(long, long) is true.
    CheckPointerImpl  
    CheckpointerLifecycle  
    CheckPointScheduler  
    CountCommittedTransactionThreshold  
    DetachedCheckpointAppender  
    PeriodicThresholdPolicy
    The periodic check point threshold policy uses the GraphDatabaseSettings.check_point_interval_time and GraphDatabaseSettings.check_point_interval_tx to decide when check points processes should be started.
    ReachedThreshold  
    RecoveryThreshold  
    SimpleTriggerInfo
    Simple implementation of a trigger info taking in construction the name/description of what triggered the check point and offering the possibility to be enriched with a single optional extra description.
    StoreCopyCheckPointMutex
    Mutex between store-copy and check-point.
    TimeCheckPointThreshold
